title: Secretary of State Clinton to Hold Briefing on the Administration's Middle East Peace Process | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 20, 2010

 



Secretary of State Clinton to Hold Briefing on the Administration's Middle East Peace Process




WASHINGTON— Secretary of State Hillary Clinton will brief reporters on the Middle East Peace Process at the State Department Briefing Room, Friday August 20 at 11 a.m.  Secretary Clinton will be joined by Special Envoy for Middle East Peace Talks Senator George Mitchell.  To access the briefing, dial-in information follows: 
WHO:            Secretary of State Hillary Clinton and Special Envoy for Middle East Peace Talks Senator George Mitchell
WHAT:           Briefing to discuss the Administration’s Middle East Peace Process
WHEN:          Today, Friday, August 20
TIME:            11:00 a.m. EST
Dial-in:          1-888-606-5953
Passcode:    CLINTON
